fast3d.control

Class SimpleControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.control.Control
      • fast3d.control.SimpleControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.ContainerListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RotationAutoControl, RotationControl, SFPUControl

    public abstract class SimpleControl
extends Control
    provides some protected fields to easily access the most useful properties of a SimplePanel3d
    • sp3d - the cast of p3d to SimplePanel3d
    • framerate - short for sp3d.frameRate()
    • universe - short for sp3d.getUni()
    • cam - short for sp3d.getCam()

    can be used just like a normal control
    Author:
    Tim Trense
    See Also:
    Control

      SimpleControl(SimplePanel3d p3d)
      constructs a new SimpleControl on the given SimplePanel3d, which is passed to super
